original_agent_pattern.description: Documentation files for all versioned releases. The original version folder (e.g., 'version-3.5.2') is preserved in the translation path.

folder_patterns.description: Documentation files for all versioned releases. The original version folder (e.g., 'version-3.5.2') is preserved in the translation path.

original_agent_pattern.description: Documentation files for the 'community' section, from a custom docs plugin instance with id 'community'.

folder_patterns.description: Documentation files for the 'community' section, from a custom docs plugin instance with id 'community'.

original_agent_pattern.description: Documentation files for the 'docs-tests' section, inferred from a custom docs plugin instance with id 'docs-tests'.

folder_patterns.description: Documentation files for the 'docs-tests' section, inferred from a custom docs plugin instance with id 'docs-tests'.

original_agent_pattern.description: Main blog posts for the default blog instance.

folder_patterns.description: Main blog posts for the default blog instance.

original_agent_pattern.description: Content for the custom changelog plugin, which behaves like a blog. Source path 'changelog/' is inferred from configuration.

folder_patterns.description: Content for the custom changelog plugin, which behaves like a blog. Source path 'changelog/' is inferred from configuration.

original_agent_pattern.description: Blog posts for the 'blog-tests' instance, inferred from a custom blog plugin instance with id 'blog-tests'.

folder_patterns.description: Blog posts for the 'blog-tests' instance, inferred from a custom blog plugin instance with id 'blog-tests'.

original_agent_pattern.description: JSON files for UI, theme, plugin labels, and sidebar translations. The source is the 'en' locale folder.

folder_patterns.description: JSON files for UI, theme, plugin labels, and sidebar translations. The source is the 'en' locale folder.
